statements: DELETE FROM TicketSales WHERE event_name = 'Concert A' AND tickets_sold < 1000;
DELETE FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100 AND ticket_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE event_name = 'Music Fest' AND attendee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' AND quantity = 2;
DELETE FROM Concerts WHERE venue_name = 'Madison Square Garden';
DELETE FROM TicketSales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_status IN ('sold', 'reserved') AND ticket_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
DELETE FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
